author: undetermined
full_text:
Breaking News | Tripura police confirms that Sheikh Hasina reaches Agartala after she resigns as PM of Bangladesh

On Monday, Bangladesh Army Chief Waker-Uz-Zaman spoke to the nation following Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's resignation and departure from the country. This comes as the army has taken control, and plans are underway to establish an interim government.

Sheikh Hasina Reaches India, Agartala After She Resigns As PM Of Bangladesh: Tripura Police Confirms

Last Updated: August 05, 2024, 15:51 IST

This appears to be a breaking news video report about Sheikh Hasina's resignation and arrival in India. The key points are:
- Sheikh Hasina has resigned as Prime Minister of Bangladesh
- She has reached Agartala, India 
- Bangladesh Army Chief Waker-Uz-Zaman has addressed the nation
- The army has taken control and plans to establish an interim government
title: Fact:  Tripura police confirms that Sheikh Hasina reaches Agartala after she resigns as PM of Bangladesh. On Monday, Bangladesh Army Chief Waker-Uz-Zaman spoke to the nation following Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina’s resignation and departure from the country. This comes as the army has taken control, and plans are underway to establish an interim government.
vclaim: Sheikh Hasina has resigned as Prime Minister of Bangladesh and reached Agartala, India. Bangladesh Army Chief Waker-Uz-Zaman addressed the nation following Hasina's resignation. The Bangladesh army has taken control and plans to establish an interim government.
